thread.title: Lisa Rinna, 53, posts nude selfie on Instagram | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Lisa Rinna, 53, posts nude selfie on Instagram | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.Com
title: Lisa Rinna, 53, posts nude selfie on Instagram | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 135 shares It appears like the Real Housewives star had just got out of the shower as her signature voluminous shag bob was pushed back wet from her face. The picture was very reminiscent of fellow reality star Kim Kardashian's famed nude picture which she shared last year. Doing it for Hef: Lisa, who previously posed for Playboy (pictured 2009) said she posted the nude snap in celebration of the magazine returning to showing nudes Baby on board: Lisa posed for the magazine first in 1998 while she was pregnant with now 18-year-old daughter Delilah Lisa did not credit Kim for the inspiration but instead shouted out Playboy and the magazine's decision to return to showing nude pictures. The star captioned the snap: 'Cheers to @playboy for going back to nudes. #thefemalebodyisbeautiful.' The wife of Harry Hamlin knows a thing or two about being in Playboy having graced the cover of the magazine not one, but twice. Lisa posed for the magazine first in 1998 while she was pregnant with now 18-year-old daughter Delilah and then again in 2009 in a Mrs. Robinson-themed shoot. Been there, done that: The picture was very reminiscent of fellow reality star Kim Kardashian's famed nude picture which she shared last year
